verses.verse: Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of my salvation, <S%H3444><s%> I have cried <S%H6817><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> and night before you. <S%H3915><s%>
Let my prayer <S%H8605><s%> enter <S%H935><s%> into your presence. <S%H6440><s%> Turn <S%H5186><s%> your ear <S%H241><s%> to my cry. <S%H7440><s%>
For my soul <S%H5315><s%> is full <S%H7646><s%> of troubles. <S%H7451><s%> My life <S%H2416><s%> draws near <S%H5060><s%> to Sheol. <S%H7585><s%>
I am counted <S%H2803><s%> among those who go down <S%H3381><s%> into the pit. <S%H953><s%> I am like a man <S%H1397><s%> who has no help, <S%H353><s%>

set <S%H2670><s%> apart among the dead, <S%H4191><s%> like the slain <S%H2491><s%> who lie <S%H7901><s%> in the grave, <S%H6913><s%> whom you remember <S%H2142><s%> no more. <S%H1504><s%> They are cut off from your hand. <S%H3027><s%>
You have laid <S%H7896><s%> me in the lowest <S%H8482><s%> pit, <S%H953><s%> in the darkest <S%H4285><s%> depths. <S%H4688><s%>
Your wrath <S%H2534><s%> lies heavily <S%H5564><s%> on me. <S%H6031><s%> You have afflicted me with all your waves. <S%H4867><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

You have taken <S%H7368><s%> my friends <S%H3045><s%> from <S%H7368><s%> me. <S%H7896><s%> You have made me an abomination <S%H8441><s%> to them. <S%H3607><s%> I am confined, and I can't <S%H3318><s%> escape.

My eyes <S%H5869><s%> are dim <S%H1669><s%> from grief. <S%H6040><s%> I have called <S%H7121><s%> on you daily, <S%H3117><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> I have spread out <S%H7849><s%> my hands to you. <S%H3709><s%>
Do you show <S%H6213><s%> wonders <S%H6382><s%> to the dead? <S%H4191><s%> Do the dead <S%H7496><s%> rise <S%H6965><s%> up and praise <S%H3034><s%> you? <S%H5542><s%> Selah.
Is your loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> declared <S%H5608><s%> in the grave? <S%H6913><s%> Or your faithfulness <S%H530><s%> in Destruction? <S%H11><s%>
Are your wonders <S%H6382><s%> made known <S%H3045><s%> in the dark? <S%H2822><s%> Or your righteousness <S%H6666><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of forgetfulness? <S%H5388><s%>
But to you, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, I have cried. <S%H7768><s%> In the morning, <S%H1242><s%> my prayer <S%H8605><s%> comes before you. <S%H6923><s%>
Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> why do you reject <S%H2186><s%> my soul? <S%H5315><s%> Why do you hide <S%H5641><s%> your face from me? <S%H6440><s%>
I am afflicted <S%H6041><s%> and ready to die <S%H1478><s%> from my youth <S%H5290><s%> up. <S%H5375><s%> While I suffer your terrors, <S%H367><s%> I am distracted. <S%H6323><s%>
Your fierce wrath <S%H2740><s%> has gone over <S%H5674><s%> me. <S%H1161><s%> Your terrors have cut me off. <S%H6789><s%>
They came around <S%H5437><s%> me like water <S%H4325><s%> all day <S%H3117><s%> long. <S%H5362><s%> They completely engulfed me. <S%H3162><s%>
You have put lover <S%H157><s%> and friend <S%H7453><s%> far <S%H7368><s%> from me, <S%H3045><s%> and my friends into darkness. <S%H4285><s%>
